manifest_description.message: A browser extension that detects shadowbans on X (formerly Twitter).

accountShadowbanned.message: This user may be shadowbanned, so their posts might not appear in search results.

accountShadowbannedAndTweetFlaggedAsSens.message: This user may be shadowbanned, so their post might not appear in search results. Additionally, this post is flagged as sensitive.

accountAndTweetShadowbanned.message: This post is age-restricted and cannot be viewed by users under 18 or those who are not logged in. It may also not appear in search results.

accountIsBlockedInSomeCountries.message: This user is blocked in some countries.

tweetFlaggedAsSensitive.message: This post is flagged as sensitive and may not appear in search results depending on the viewer's settings.

thisUserIsShadowbanned.message: This user may be shadowbanned, and their posts might not appear in search results.

tweetShadowbanned.message: This post is age-restricted and cannot be viewed by users under 18 or those who are not logged in. It may also not appear in search results.

tweetNoProblem.message: No issues were found with this post.

accountIsShadowbannedOrFlaggedAsSensitiv.message: üö´Account may be shadowbanned or flagged as sensitive

profileDoesNotContainSensitiveMedia.message: ‚úÖProfile media is not flagged as sensitive

accountIsNotWithheldInCountries.message: ‚úÖAccount is not blocked in any countries (details)

accountIsWithheldInCountries.message: üö´Account is blocked in the following countries (details): $1

tweetMayNotBeSearchable.message: ‚ö†Ô∏èPost may not appear in search results depending on viewer settings

tweetIsNotSearchable.message: üö´Post may not appear in search results

falsePositivesAndFalseNegativesOccur.message: Like other similar tools, Shadowban Scanner can produce false positives and false negatives. For more details on how it works, click here.

translatedByAI.message: Translated from Japanese to English by AI. If you notice any issues, please contact @keita_roboin via DM or visit the GitHub repository.
translatedByAI.description: This field is used if the translation was done by AI. Otherwise, set this field to an empty string. Example sentence: "Translated from Japanese to by AI. If you notice any issues, please contact @keita_roboin via DM or visit the GitHub repository."

settingsAlwaysShowMessagesIfYourAccountS.message: Always display scan results if your account is shadowbanned.

settingsShowMessagesInUnproblematicTweet.message: Display scan results in non-problematic posts

settingsShowMessagesInUnproblematicProfi.message: Display scan results in non-problematic profiles

settingsShowNotesInMessages.message: Display notes at the bottom of the message

settingsShowTweetButton.message: Display buttons to post the results

settingsPleaseReload.message: Please reload X after changing settings.

privacyPolicyText.message: As a rule, this extension performs all processing on the user's computer. No data is transmitted to external servers. It also does not access X's internal API by obtaining user credentials without permission, as seen with some other extensions. Any web pages not included in this extension are subject to their own terms of use and privacy policies.

letsStartWithASimpleInitialSetup.message: Let's begin with a simple initial setup.

pleaseSelectOneOfThem.message: Please select one. You can change these settings later.

displayForAllTweetsAndAccounts.message: Display scan results for all posts and accounts

displayOnlyForProblematicTweets.message: Display scan results only for problematic posts and accounts

displayOnlyInYourOwnTweets.message: Display scan results only for your own posts

displayInAllUsersTweets.message: Display scan results for all users' posts

initialSetupCompleted.message: Initial setup completed! Would you like to open the usage instructions?
